sentences.sContent: Shaoxing Plaza, along the moat to go north, not how far the streets there.
sentences.sContent_eng: Shaoxing Plaza, along the moat to go north, not how far the streets there.
sentences.sCn: 沿着绍兴广场的护城河北走，没有多远，老街就出现了。

sentences.sContent: The bridge lies like a trench in the fortress of the moat, which is shaped to blend in with the outlines of the landscape.
sentences.sContent_eng: The bridge lies like a trench in the fortress of the moat, which is shaped to blend in with the outlines of the landscape.
sentences.sCn: 摒“这座桥就像是坐落在护城河中的一条沟渠，这种造型是为了使它与周围的风景融合在一起。”

trans.tranOther: a deep wide hole, usually filled with water, dug around a castle as a defence
